languages.text: Шорох, с которым этот клинок покидает ножны, шепчет имена тех, чья смерть угодна Неумирающему.

traits.locale_text: Шорох, с которым этот клинок покидает ножны, шепчет имена тех, чья смерть угодна Неумирающему.

languages.text: The rustle with which this blade leaves its scabbard whispers the names of those whose deaths would please the Undying One.
languages.original_text: Шорох, с которым этот клинок покидает ножны, шепчет имена тех, чья смерть угодна Неумирающему.

traits.locale_text: The rustle with which this blade leaves its scabbard whispers the names of those whose deaths would please the Undying One.
The rustle with which this blade leaves its scabbard whispers the names of those whose deaths would please the Undying One.

The rustle with which this blade leaves its scabbard whispers the names of those whose deaths would please the Undying One.

languages.text: Das Geräusch, mit dem diese Klinge ihre Scheide verlässt, flüstert die Namen derer, dessen Tod den Todlosen erfreuen würden.
languages.original_text: The rustle with which this blade leaves its scabbard whispers the names of those whose deaths would please the Undying One.

traits.locale_text: Das Geräusch, mit dem diese Klinge ihre Scheide verlässt, flüstert die Namen derer, dessen Tod den Todlosen erfreuen würden.

languages.text: El sonido con el que esta hoja abandona su vaina susurra los nombres de aquellos cuyas muertes complacerán al Inmortal.
languages.original_text: The rustle with which this blade leaves its scabbard whispers the names of those whose deaths would please the Undying One.

traits.locale_text: El sonido con el que esta hoja abandona su vaina susurra los nombres de aquellos cuyas muertes complacerán al Inmortal.

languages.text: この刃が鞘を離れる時のこすれる音が、その死が不死の者を喜ばせる者の名前を囁く。
languages.original_text: The rustle with which this blade leaves its scabbard whispers the names of those whose deaths would please the Undying One.

traits.locale_text: この刃が鞘を離れる時のこすれる音が、その死が不死の者を喜ばせる者の名前を囁く。

languages.text: 这把利刃出鞘时会发出沙沙的声音，低语着那些大限已至人们的名字，渴望用他们的生命取悦不死之神。
languages.original_text: The rustle with which this blade leaves its scabbard whispers the names of those whose deaths would please the Undying One.

traits.locale_text: 这把利刃出鞘时会发出沙沙的声音，低语着那些大限已至人们的名字，渴望用他们的生命取悦不死之神。

languages.text: Le bruissement que produit cette lame en quittant son fourreau est comme un murmure qui prononcerait le nom de ceux dont la mort plairait à l'Immortel.
languages.original_text: The rustle with which this blade leaves its scabbard whispers the names of those whose deaths would please the Undying One.

traits.locale_text: Le bruissement que produit cette lame en quittant son fourreau est comme un murmure qui prononcerait le nom de ceux dont la mort plairait à l'Immortel.

languages.text: Bu kılıcın kınından ayrılırken çıkardığı hışırtı, ölümleriyle Ölmeyen'i memnun edeceklerin isimlerini fısıldar.
languages.original_text: The rustle with which this blade leaves its scabbard whispers the names of those whose deaths would please the Undying One.
